imdb.plot outline: For some people the world is getting stranger. Behind the political turmoil that seems to congest our lives, there are those who choose to follow a peculiar path of controversy and intrigue. These people can be family, friends or complete strangers. Paranormal Investigators (PI) UNCUT explores the lives of these individuals that passionately thirst for life's unique adventures. See the world through their eyes.
imdb.title: Paranormal Investigators Uncut
